snippet.title: Necroking | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Necroking is a turn-based tactics roguelite with vast deckbuilding. Build your skulls deck, rise skeletons and other scum to defeat settlements desecrated by life. Prepare to unleash the ultimate power of necromancy and claim your rightful place as the feared Necroking. 

Playtest now on Steam: https://s.team/a/2852980
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/alawar
